com.jinkchak

Class MainGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jinkchak.MainGUI

  • public class MainGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class constructs the GUI of our application, using the classes provided by the SWT.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Label AlgoDetailsLabel 
      private org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser browser

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text EncryptionTextBox 
      private Schmidt_Samoa_Encryptor encryptor 
      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Label msgLabel 
      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text pTextBox 
      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text qTextBox 
      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainGUI(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display)
      This constructor initializes the GUI variables and event loop, and creates a new shell for the Display object passed to it as a parameter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void initListeners()
      This method initializes all the event handlers of the widgets in the GUI.
      void initUI()
      This method initializes the form layout of the GUI, and initializes the values and location of each widget in the GUI.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method, that creates a display object and creates a MainGUI object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainGUI

        public MainGUI(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display)
        This constructor initializes the GUI variables and event loop, and creates a new shell for the Display object passed to it as a parameter. It also initializes an object of the Schmidt_Samoa_Encryptor class.
        Parameters:
        display - A Display object

    • Method Detail

      • initListeners

        private void initListeners()
        This method initializes all the event handlers of the widgets in the GUI. These event handlers make use of a Schmidt_Samoa_Encryptor object to encrypt and decrypt messages entered by the user.

      • initUI

        public void initUI()
        This method initializes the form layout of the GUI, and initializes the values and location of each widget in the GUI.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method, that creates a display object and creates a MainGUI object.
